revision.text: ==Navajo== ===Etymology=== {{nv-prefixes|y-peg|3s|d}} {{nv-link-to-stem|-dziih}} {{nv-link-to-root|-DZÍÍʼ|remain}}. ===Verb=== {{head|nv|verb}} # {{qualifier|intransitive}} he/she has [[survive#Verb|survived]], [[remain#Verb|remains]], is [[leave#Verb|left]] # {{qualifier|transitive}} he/she has [[leave#Verb|left]], [[remain#Verb|remaining]] ====Conjugation==== {{nv-paradigm|momentaneous|∅/yi}}. {{nv-verbtable|IMPERFECTIVE |yisdziih|yiidziih|deiidziih|nidziih|wohdziih|daahdziih|yidziih|—|jidziih|dajidziih}} {{nv-verbtable|PERFECTIVE |yisdzííʼ|yiidzííʼ|deiidzííʼ|yínídzííʼ|woohdzííʼ|daoohdzííʼ|[[yidzííʼ]] / [[yoodzííʼ]] (?) |—|joodzííʼ|dajoodzííʼ}} {{nv-verbtable|FUTURE |deesdzih|diidzih|dadiidzih|díídzih|doohdzih|dadoohdzih|—|—|jidoodzih|dazhdoodzih}} ====Verbal stems==== * IMPERFECTIVE: -dziih * PERFECTIVE: -dzííʼ * FUTURE: -dzih * ITERATIVE: -dzih * OPTATIVE: -dziih
